member.name: T:WebAssembly.JSInterop.InternalCalls
member.summary: Methods that map to the functions compiled into the Mono WebAssembly runtime, as defined by 'mono_add_internal_call' calls in driver.c.

member.name: T:Microsoft.JSInterop.WebAssembly.WebAssemblyJSRuntime
member.summary: Provides methods for invoking JavaScript functions for applications running on the Mono WebAssembly runtime.

member.name: M:Microsoft.JSInterop.WebAssembly.WebAssemblyJSRuntime.InvokeUnmarshalled``1(System.String)
member.summary: Invokes the JavaScript function registered with the specified identifier.
member.typeparam: The .NET type corresponding to the function's return value type.
member.param: The identifier used when registering the target function.
member.returns: The result of the function invocation.

member.name: M:Microsoft.JSInterop.WebAssembly.WebAssemblyJSRuntime.InvokeUnmarshalled``2(System.String,``0)
member.summary: Invokes the JavaScript function registered with the specified identifier.
member.typeparam: The type of the first argument.
The .NET type corresponding to the function's return value type.
member.param: The identifier used when registering the target function.
member.returns: The result of the function invocation.

member.name: M:Microsoft.JSInterop.WebAssembly.WebAssemblyJSRuntime.InvokeUnmarshalled``3(System.String,``0,``1)
member.summary: Invokes the JavaScript function registered with the specified identifier.
member.typeparam: The type of the first argument.
The type of the second argument.
The .NET type corresponding to the function's return value type.
member.param: The identifier used when registering the target function.
member.returns: The result of the function invocation.

member.name: M:Microsoft.JSInterop.WebAssembly.WebAssemblyJSRuntime.InvokeUnmarshalled``4(System.String,``0,``1,``2)
member.summary: Invokes the JavaScript function registered with the specified identifier.
member.typeparam: The type of the first argument.
The type of the second argument.
The type of the third argument.
The .NET type corresponding to the function's return value type.
member.param: The identifier used when registering the target function.
member.returns: The result of the function invocation.
